data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Juarez have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Juarez.
Guadalajara takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 11, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for Juarez, close to Guadalajara's area.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Juarez.
Guadalajara are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 19, Hiram Mier (Guadalajara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez has awarded Guadalajara a corner.
Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez's header is off-target for Guadalajara.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 24, Isaac Brizuela of Guadalajara gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Juarez push upfield and Bruno Romo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Guadalajara defence.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Juarez.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guadalajara drive forward but Uriel Antuna is judged offside.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 39, Juarez drive upfield and Brian Rubio gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Guadalajara defender.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 42, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Jesus Sanchez (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Maximiliano Olivera (Juarez) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 47, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Juarez throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Guadalajara pushes forward through Jesus Angulo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bruno Romo (Juarez) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 55, Guadalajara have been given a penalty...
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Jose Macias.
Guadalajara make their first substitution with Alexis Vega replacing Jose Macias.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela has run offside.
In the minute 63, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Juarez.
William Mendieta is replacing Martin Rabunal for the home team.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Juarez takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 65, Juarez's Dario Lezcano attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Jesus Angulo puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 66, Uriel Antuna instrumental with a fine assist.
Hiram Mier is booked for the away team.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 69, Dario Lezcano (Juarez) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez has awarded Juarez a corner.
In the minute 71, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Alexis Vega (Guadalajara) has received a first yellow card.
Ronaldo Cisneros is on a sub for Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara.
In the minute 76, The away team replace Jesus Angulo with Eduardo Lopez.
Brian Rubio (Juarez) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juarez takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 77, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Juarez make their third substitution with Carlos Rosel replacing Brian Rubio.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Flavio Santos with Alan Mendoza.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Luis Lopez is booked for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Jose Vazquez is on a sub for Jesus Molina for Guadalajara.
In the minute 86, Dieter Villalpando is replacing Fernando Beltran for the away team.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Guadalajara.
Dieter Villalpando (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 88, Jefferson Intriago of Juarez smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Juarez's half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara close to the penalty box.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 8 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
The home team replace Luis Lopez with Martin Luis Galvan.
Alexis Vega (Guadalajara) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
